original: Guru Angad
translation: 安格德上师

original: The Sikh Guru is spreading the use of the Gurmukhi alphabet, promoting education.
translation: 这位锡克教上师正在推广古木基文的使用，促进教育。

original: Guru Amar Das
translation: 阿马尔·达斯上师

original: The Sikh Guru has sent out local representatives called Masand to spread the faith and guide Sikhs.
translation: 这位锡克教上师派出了名为摩桑德的地方代表传播信仰及引导锡克教徒.

original: Guru Ram Das
translation: 拉姆·达斯上师

original: The Sikh Guru is structuring our society and laying the foundation of the center of the religion.
translation: 这位锡克教上师正在构建社会体系及为宗教中心奠基.

original: Guru Arjan
translation: 阿尔琼上师

original: The Sikh Guru is writing the Adi Granth, a collection of spiritual knowledge from previous gurus and others.
translation: 这位锡克教上师正在编著《阿迪·格兰特》，这是一部收录先贤与其他上师宗教知识的文集。

original: Guru Hargobind
translation: 哈尔戈宾德上师

original: The Sikh Guru has begun to arm his followers and train them for combat.
translation: 这位锡克教上师开始武装他的追随者们并且训练他们作战.

original: Guru Har Rai
translation: 哈尔拉益上师

original: The Sikh Guru is gentle and diplomatic, seeking peaceful solutions while being wary of compromising his faith.
translation: 这位锡克教上师彬彬有礼擅长外交,寻求和平的解决方式并谨慎地妥协著自己的信仰.

original: Guru Har Krishan
translation: 哈尔克里欣上师

original: The Sikh Guru is very young, making diplomacy in religious matters more difficult.
translation: 这位锡克教上师在处理宗教外交问题上太过年轻了.

original: Guru Tegh Bahadur
translation: 德格·巴哈杜尔上师

original: The Sikh Guru has taken a stand against the religious persecution of Hindus.
translation: 这位锡克教上师坚定反对印度教徒的宗教迫害.

original: Guru Gobind Singh
translation: 憍宾僧伽上师

original: The Sikh Guru is building the foundation of the Khalsa, uniting Sikhs and preparing them to give their lives fighting oppression.
translation: 这位锡克教上师正在为卡尔沙教团奠基，将锡克教徒团结起来并使他们准备好为反抗压迫献身.

original: Save the Burning World
translation: 拯救这个燃烧的世界

original: Our faith was born seeking unity where there was discord and the belief that God was above the religious divides of the world. However, if we are to put out the fires of sin in this world, we need people to embrace the truth.
translation: 我们的信仰为在这个不谐的世界中寻求大同而生，并且坚信著神是凌驾于世间的宗教分歧之上的. 但是，如果我们想要扑灭这世间的原罪之火，我们需要坚信真理的人.

original: Saving the Burning World
translation: 正拯救著这个燃烧的世界

original: We have taken it upon ourselves to root out evil in the world by showing people the true path, even if it means offending other faiths.
translation: 我们将根除世间罪恶视为己任，为众生指引真理之路，即使这意味著要冒犯其他信仰.

original: The Sikh Faith
translation: 锡克教信仰

original: [Root.GetName] is situated on the border between adherents of Hinduism and Islam. In this area marked by religious tension and differences, a man named Nanak has started to preach that there is no Hindu or Muslim, but that the truth is with God, who is neither.\n\nAlthough his rejection of ancient customs has outraged devoted [Root.Religion.GetName] believers, Nanak's disregard for caste and creed has allowed his teachings to take root among the population. His disciples are known as Sikhs and are spreading this new faith rapidly throughout [Root.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetName]坐落在印度教徒和伊斯兰教徒聚居区之间.在这个宗教形势严峻复杂的地方,一位名叫拿那克的男人开始布道，宣称世间既无印度教徒，也没有穆斯林，真理只为上帝所有,而他既非印度教徒，也非穆斯林.\n\n虽然他对古老习俗的排斥使得 [Root.Religion.GetName]的信徒们异常愤怒，拿那克对于种姓制度的无视态度和他创立的信条仍然使他的教导在民众中扎了根. 他的信徒们被称为锡克教徒，他们迅速将这种新的信仰传遍了[Root.GetName].

original: We'll need to talk to this Nanak about the [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 我们需要找到这个拿那克，和他谈谈关于[Root.Owner.Religion.GetName]的信仰的问题.

original: Guru Angad
translation: 安格德上师

original: 'Death would not be called bad, O people, if one knew how to truly die.'\n\nThe founder of our faith has passed away. Guru Nanak's body is dead, but the spirit of the Guru lives on in his successor, Guru Angad. Angad was one of Nanak's most loyal followers and carries on his legacy in establishing the Sikh community, spreading the use of a new alphabet to promote education of the young.
translation: '死亡不应该被称为坏事，人们哪，如果一个人知道如何真正地死去.'\n\n我们信仰的创始人去世了. 拿那克上师的肉体死去了，但他的精神存在于他的继承人安格德上师身上.安格德是拿那克最忠实的追随者，秉持著他的遗志，建立锡克教社区，传播新字母表的使用，以此促进年轻人的教育.

original: The light of the Guru shines on.
translation: 上师的光芒永远指引著前路.

original: Guru Amar Das
translation: 阿马尔·达斯上师

original: Guru Angad has passed on and left the guruship in the care of his loyal servant Amar Das. A man of great humility, Guru Amar Das nevertheless has ambitions for the teachings of Sikhism, strengthening the doctrine of equality that has gained popularity among the common people and establishing religious representatives called the Masand, spreading the word of our faith further than the Guru alone ever could.
translation: 安格德上师去世了，把上师的位置传给了他忠实的仆人阿马尔·达斯上师。尽管阿马尔·达斯上师是一个极其谦卑的人，然而他却有著将锡克教发扬光大的野心，他强化了有关众生平等的教义，这使得它受到了更多普通人的欢迎，他还设立了名为摩桑德的宗教代表，使我们的教义比上师孤身一人之时传播得要远得多。

original: Our Guru is the strength of the weak and the emancipation of the slave!
translation: 我们的上师是弱者的保护神和奴隶的解放者!

original: Guru Ram Das
translation: 拉姆·达斯上师

original: Guru Amar Das has left this world and passed the guruship to his disciple and son-in-law Jetha, now known as Ram Das. He will oversee the continued construction of our holy city and encourages followers to attain enlightenment not only through solitary meditation, but from actively engaging with the community and their fellow Sikhs.
translation: 阿马尔·达斯上师离世了，将上师的位置传给了他的信徒、女婿杰塔,即现在人们所知的阿马尔·达斯上师。他督促了我们神圣城市的继续建设，并且鼓励他的追随者们不但从孤独的冥思中悟道，也要通过积极参与到社区和锡克教友们的活动中悟道。

original: Our Guru is a servant of God and we serve our Guru.
translation: 我的上师是真神的仆人，而我们是上师的仆人.

original: Guru Arjan
translation: 阿尔琼上师

original: After the death of Amar Das, his younger son Arjan has been chosen as the next Guru, despite contention from his older brother. To preserve the knowledge and hymns of past gurus, Arjan has begun to compile a volume known as the Adi Granth. The spiritual writing collected within come from many great teachers and the Guru has instructed that anyone may partake of it. He has also founded a great temple, the Harmandir Sahib, giving all Sikhs a place to meet and worship.
translation: 阿摩罗檀娑上师圆寂后,他的小儿子阿旬被选作下一任上师，而非他的哥哥. 为了保存先圣们的知识与,阿旬开始编纂脍炙人口的经书作品集——本初经.这部文化巨著聚集了许多导师与上师们的心血，完成它的任务被分配下去，很多人都有资格参与其中.他还修建了一座宏伟的寺庙,本哈曼迪尔寺,为全部的锡克教徒提供了集会与礼拜的场所.

original: We shall keep the knowledge safe and build upon it.
translation: 我们应该保护好我们的知识，以此将我们的事业发扬光大.

original: Guru Hargobind
translation: 哈尔戈宾德上师

original: 'As I crush these onions you have brought to me, so shall your son crush the heads of his enemies, and be at once a great warrior and exalted Guru.'\n\nSo spoke seer Baba Buddha of Arjan's successor, Guru Hargobind. The world has changed and the Sikhs can no longer trust their potential enemies to be merciful, but have taken up arms against those who seek to make martyrs out of the Guru and his disciples.
translation: '就好比我捏碎这些你带给我的洋葱一样,你的儿子也要捏碎他的敌人们的头颅,这样他就可以成为一名伟大的勇士和一位高尚的上师.'\n\n哈尔戈宾德上师的继承人，先知巴布佛如是说.时代变了，锡克教徒们不再轻信他们的敌人们会怀有仁慈,而是把自己武装了起来，对抗那些打算屠杀上师及其信徒的敌人们.

original: Swords shall replace the crown of the Guru.
translation: 宝剑应该取代上师的王冠.

original: Guru Har Rai
translation: 哈尔拉益上师

original: Guru Hargobind's grandson, Har Rai, has been trained by his grandfather in preparation for taking over the guruship, and now that time has come. Although instructed in the ways of combat and maintaining the army built by his predecessor, Har Rai is of a more sensitive disposition and his love for all living things compels him to seek diplomatic solutions.
translation: 哈尔戈宾德上师的孙子,哈尔拉益,一直以来被他的爷爷作为继承人培养，准备著接过上师的衣冕,如今时机已到. 尽管前任指示他坚持武装斗争的道路，保持武装力量的建设，哈尔拉益上师的敏感性格和他对众生的博爱促使他寻求外交的解决方式.

original: Enough of battle; now is the time for healing.
translation: 战争到此为止吧; 如今到了修养生息的时候了.

original: Guru Har Krishan
translation: 哈尔克里欣上师

original: The body of Guru Har Rai passed on, leaving a very young successor to assume the mantle. Har Krishan was deemed a better candidate than his older brother, who put diplomatic pragmatism before adherence to the faith. While our new Guru does not lack piety or kindness, his young age of only 4 years limits our diplomatic options.
translation: 哈尔拉益上师去世了,留下了一位非常年轻的继承人承其衣钵. 比起他那个把外交实用主义看得比信仰的忠贞还要重要的哥哥，哈尔克里欣是一个更为合适的候选人. 尽管我们的上师并不缺乏虔诚和善良，但他仅有4岁，这大大地限制了我们的外交选择.

original: Our Guru is still our blessing.
translation: 我们的上师仍是我们的福分.

original: Guru Tegh Bahadur
translation: 德格·巴哈杜尔上师

original: The young Guru Har Krishan has tragically passed away. After some confusion about who his successor might be, Tegh Bahadur has been chosen as the new Guru. Initially a reclusive man, he has risen to the occasion and proven to be a determined leader. Despite his own rejection of rituals and ceremonial practices, he has taken on the task of safeguarding not only the religion of his own followers, but of Hindus who flee to our lands from persecution.
translation: 年轻的哈尔克里欣上师不幸去世了. 经历了一系列关于谁是继承人的疑云后，德格·巴哈杜尔上师被选作了上师. 最初他是一名隐士，但他很快地崭露头角，证明了自己是一位坚定果决的领袖. 尽管他拒绝一切繁文缛节，他仍然采取了一系列安全措施——不仅仅为了保护他自己的信徒,也为了保护那些为躲避宗教迫害而逃到我们领土的印度教徒们.

original: Our Guru is the True King and the shield of the oppressed.
translation: 我们的上师是一位真正的王者，是所有受迫害者的保护神.

original: Guru Gobind Singh
translation: 憍宾僧伽上师

original: With the death of Tegh Bahadur, Sikhs have once again had to face hostility from their political and religious enemies. His son, Gobind Rai, is determined to unite the Sikhs and gather those who are willing to give their lives for their Guru. The coming decades will build up to the creation of the Khalsa, those initiated by the Guru's ceremonies into our faith, and Gobind Rai will be known to history as Guru Gobind Singh.
translation: 随著谛伽婆突上师的仙逝,锡克教徒们不得不又一次直面政治与宗教上众多敌人的敌意.他的儿子憍宾罗下定决心团结所有锡克教徒，聚集起那些愿意为了他们的上师献出生命的信徒. 接下来的几十年里我们见证了哈尔萨的诞生，这是由上师借由仪式传授给我们的信仰。憍宾罗在史书中被称作憍宾僧伽上师.

original: The Khalsa belong to God, Victory belongs to God!
translation: 哈尔萨属于真神！胜利属于真神!

original: Guru Granth Sahib
translation: 格兰特 萨希卜上师

original: Guru Gobind Singh is gone, but has passed on the guruship to one who shall never die. The collection of sacred texts known as the Adi Granth, once created by Guru Arjan and built upon by gurus after him, was designated by Gobind Singh as the final successor who will guide the Sikhs: The Guru Granth Sahib. Henceforth, whatever questions Sikhs may have for the Guru shall be answered by the knowledge contained within it.
translation: 憍宾僧伽上师去世了，将上师之位传给了永生之人. 圣典被收集整理，成为了著名的本初经,阿尔琼上师创造了它，他的继承者们完善了他,格兰特辛格上师被憍宾僧伽上师制定为锡克上师的最终继承人.从此以后,锡克教徒们向上师所提出的任何问题，都可以从本初经里面寻找到答案.

original: Those who want to meet God can find Him in its hymns.
translation: 那些想要寻找真神的人，可以在经书的字里行间中寻找到他.

original: The Guru is the Fulfiller of the desires of the mind.
translation: 上师是满足心灵欲望的人。

original: No More Gurus
translation: 不再有上师了

original: [Root.GetName] is now a [Root.Religion.GetName] state. We no longer call ourselves Sikhs, and have accordingly cut off ties with the Sikh Guru.
translation: [Root.GetName]现在是一个[Root.Religion.GetName]国家。我们不再称呼自己是锡克教徒了，同时我们切断了与锡克教上师的联系。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] path will guide us from now on.
translation: 现在 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的道路会指引我们.

original: Guru in [Root.GetName]
translation: 在 [Root.GetName] 的上师

original: A man who some call a guru has arrived in [Root.GetName]. He claims to have received a revelation, being called by Heaven to travel from his home to distant lands, spreading the message of the one true God.\n\nHis local disciples insist that this God is revealed through all religions, including [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName], and defends Nanak as simply revealing the truths in our own faith. However, there is no question that these teachings reject our rituals and traditions, making people stray from the true path of [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName].
translation: 一个被人们称作上师的人到达了 [Root.GetName]. 他宣称自己受到了神灵的启示，被天堂引导着，从他的家乡旅行到遥远的地方,传播着唯一真神的旨意.\n\n他的门徒们坚称真神的旨意通过所有的宗教信仰传达,包括 [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName]，并且辩称拿那克解释了我们信仰的真相. 然而，毫无疑问，这些教义拒绝我们的仪式和传统，使人偏离了 [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName]的正确道路.

original: A man who some call a guru has arrived in [Root.GetName]. He claims to have received a revelation, being called by Heaven to travel from his home to distant lands, spreading the message of the one true God.\n\nHis local disciples insist that this God is revealed through all religions, including [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName], and defends him as simply revealing the truths in our own faith. However, there is no question that these teachings reject our rituals and traditions, making people stray from the true path of [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName].
translation: 一个被一些人称为大师的人来到了[Root.GetName]。他声称自己收到了上天的启示，从他的家乡前往远方传播唯一正确的上帝的信仰。\n\n他的当地门徒坚持认为，上帝向所有宗教包括[Root.Owner.Religion.GetName]揭示真理，并为他辩护，说他只是在我们的信仰中揭示真理。然而，毫无疑问，这些教义排斥了我们的仪式和传统，使人们偏离了通往[Root.Owner.Religion.GetName]的真正道路。

original: As long as they pay taxes, they can believe what they want.
translation: 只要他们还继续交税，管他们信仰什么呢.

original: Get this man out of [Root.GetName]!
translation: 把这个人从 [Root.GetName]赶出去!
